languages.text: "А знаешь, что у них было общего? И тот, и другой не видели дальше собственного носа. Впрочем, даже мне претит сравнивать труп на троне с падалью вроде Кунрада — у бывшего владыки Империума хотя бы был хребет и свое виденье, пускай и непростительно лживое и недалекое".

"Do you know what they had in common? Both could only see as far as themselves. Although, even I am loath to compare the corpse emperor to carrion like Kunrad — at least the Imperium's former master had a backbone and a vision, albeit one that was inexcusably deceitful and short-sighted."
languages.original_text: "А знаешь, что у них было общего? И тот, и другой не видели дальше собственного носа. Впрочем, даже мне претит сравнивать труп на троне с падалью вроде Кунрада — у бывшего владыки Империума хотя бы был хребет и свое виденье, пускай и непростительно лживое и недалекое".

traits.locale_text: "Do you know what they had in common? Both could only see as far as themselves. Although, even I am loath to compare the corpse emperor to carrion like Kunrad — at least the Imperium's former master had a backbone and a vision, albeit one that was inexcusably deceitful and short-sighted."

"Do you know what they had in common? Both could only see as far as themselves. Although, even I am loath to compare the corpse emperor to carrion like Kunrad — at least the Imperium's former master had a backbone and a vision, albeit one that was inexcusably deceitful and short-sighted."

"Do you know what they had in common? Both could only see as far as themselves. Although, even I am loath to compare the corpse emperor to carrion like Kunrad — at least the Imperium's former master had a backbone and a vision, albeit one that was inexcusably deceitful and short-sighted."

"Do you know what they had in common? Both could only see as far as themselves. Although, even I am loath to compare the corpse emperor to carrion like Kunrad — at least the Imperium's former master had a backbone and a vision, albeit one that was inexcusably deceitful and short-sighted."

"Do you know what they had in common? Both could only see as far as themselves. Although, even I am loath to compare the corpse emperor to carrion like Kunrad — at least the Imperium's former master had a backbone and a vision, albeit one that was inexcusably deceitful and short-sighted."

languages.text: « Vous savez ce qu'ils avaient en commun ? L'un comme l'autre ne voyait pas plus loin que le bout de son nez. Pour autant, même moi, je répugne à comparer l'Empereur-Cadavre à une vile charogne comme Kunrad... Au moins, l'ancien maître de l'Imperium avait du cran et une vision, si trompeuse et irréfléchie soit-elle. »
languages.original_text: "Do you know what they had in common? Both could only see as far as themselves. Although, even I am loath to compare the corpse emperor to carrion like Kunrad — at least the Imperium's former master had a backbone and a vision, albeit one that was inexcusably deceitful and short-sighted."

traits.locale_text: « Vous savez ce qu'ils avaient en commun ? L'un comme l'autre ne voyait pas plus loin que le bout de son nez. Pour autant, même moi, je répugne à comparer l'Empereur-Cadavre à une vile charogne comme Kunrad... Au moins, l'ancien maître de l'Imperium avait du cran et une vision, si trompeuse et irréfléchie soit-elle. »

languages.text: «¿Sabes qué tenían en común? Solo eran capaces de mirar por sí mismos. Aunque incluso yo detesto comparar al emperador cadáver con carroña como Kunrad; al menos el antiguo amo del Imperium tenía temple y una visión, por engañosa y miope que fuera».
languages.original_text: "Do you know what they had in common? Both could only see as far as themselves. Although, even I am loath to compare the corpse emperor to carrion like Kunrad — at least the Imperium's former master had a backbone and a vision, albeit one that was inexcusably deceitful and short-sighted."

traits.locale_text: «¿Sabes qué tenían en común? Solo eran capaces de mirar por sí mismos. Aunque incluso yo detesto comparar al emperador cadáver con carroña como Kunrad; al menos el antiguo amo del Imperium tenía temple y una visión, por engañosa y miope que fuera».

languages.text: 「二人の共通点を知っているかね？どちらも自分のことしか見えていなかった。死体の皇帝とクンラッドのような腐肉とを比較するのは、私にとっても嫌悪すべきことだが…少なくとも、帝国のかつての主はどうしようもないほどに欺瞞に満ち、近視眼的ではあったものの、気骨とビジョンはあった」
languages.original_text: "Do you know what they had in common? Both could only see as far as themselves. Although, even I am loath to compare the corpse emperor to carrion like Kunrad — at least the Imperium's former master had a backbone and a vision, albeit one that was inexcusably deceitful and short-sighted."

traits.locale_text: 「二人の共通点を知っているかね？どちらも自分のことしか見えていなかった。死体の皇帝とクンラッドのような腐肉とを比較するのは、私にとっても嫌悪すべきことだが…少なくとも、帝国のかつての主はどうしようもないほどに欺瞞に満ち、近視眼的ではあったものの、気骨とビジョンはあった」

languages.text: “你知道这两个人有什么共同点吗？他们都目不视物，除了自己之外什么都看不到。话虽如此，可即便是我，也不愿将尸皇与与昆拉德这样的无名鼠辈相提并论。帝国曾经的主人至少是个硬骨头，而且也看到了未来，虽然他看到的景象充满了谎言与短视，令人无法容忍。”
languages.original_text: "Do you know what they had in common? Both could only see as far as themselves. Although, even I am loath to compare the corpse emperor to carrion like Kunrad — at least the Imperium's former master had a backbone and a vision, albeit one that was inexcusably deceitful and short-sighted."

traits.locale_text: “你知道这两个人有什么共同点吗？他们都目不视物，除了自己之外什么都看不到。话虽如此，可即便是我，也不愿将尸皇与与昆拉德这样的无名鼠辈相提并论。帝国曾经的主人至少是个硬骨头，而且也看到了未来，虽然他看到的景象充满了谎言与短视，令人无法容忍。”

languages.text: "Wisst Ihr, was sie gemeinsam hatten? Beide haben nur sich selbst gesehen. Wobei es selbst mir widerstrebt, den Leichenimperator mit Aas wie Kunrad zu vergleichen – immerhin hatte der einstige Meister des Imperiums Rückgrat und eine Vision, wenngleich Letztere trügerisch und kurzsichtig war."
languages.original_text: "Do you know what they had in common? Both could only see as far as themselves. Although, even I am loath to compare the corpse emperor to carrion like Kunrad — at least the Imperium's former master had a backbone and a vision, albeit one that was inexcusably deceitful and short-sighted."

traits.locale_text: "Wisst Ihr, was sie gemeinsam hatten? Beide haben nur sich selbst gesehen. Wobei es selbst mir widerstrebt, den Leichenimperator mit Aas wie Kunrad zu vergleichen – immerhin hatte der einstige Meister des Imperiums Rückgrat und eine Vision, wenngleich Letztere trügerisch und kurzsichtig war."

languages.text: "Onların ortak yanı neydi biliyor musun? Kendilerinden ötesini göremiyorlardı. Hoş, ben bile ceset imparatoru Kunrad gibi bir leşçille kıyaslamamayı tercih ederim. İmparatorluk'un eski efendisi en azından omurgalıydı ve bir vizyona sahipti. Her ne kadar bu vizyon yalanlarla dolu ve kıt görüşlü olsa da."
languages.original_text: "Do you know what they had in common? Both could only see as far as themselves. Although, even I am loath to compare the corpse emperor to carrion like Kunrad — at least the Imperium's former master had a backbone and a vision, albeit one that was inexcusably deceitful and short-sighted."
